attributes.action: Stop adding yet another back door TAX
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The poor motorist comes in for higher Tax's again, Put the price of usage up for all Lorries,Vans, Caravans and coaches, they are the ones that take up more room on motor ways/ roads, and wear the surf out more quickly!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
